title: PBE
body:
i just downloaded the PBE client but i don't have a bpe account so i was like o i fucked up so i wanted to play on the normal client again but everytime i open my league it says im on the bp client how do i change this ???
{{champion:245}}

replies.body:
It sounds like you're launching League from the wrong shortcut. Try launching it from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file inside your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends).

If you still encounter issues, let me know!
